title: Fix 'Add Saree' button not working in AdminSarees

requirements.summary: Fix the 'Add Saree' button in the AdminSarees page so that clicking it opens the add saree modal form when the actor is initialized
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the 'Add Saree' button opens the saree creation modal form.
The button is not disabled after the actor has finished initializing.
The button does not enter a permanently disabled state due to async initialization logic.
Submitting the form via the modal successfully calls the addSaree mutation and adds a new saree.

file_operations.description: Fix the 'Add Saree' button to ensure it becomes enabled once the actor is initialized and opens the modal when clicked. Review the button's disabled state logic to ensure it properly reflects actor availability from the useActor hook. Ensure the onClick handler correctly sets the modal state to open the add saree form. Verify that the button is not inadvertently disabled by loading states from React Query hooks (useGetAllSarees) that should not affect the add button's availability.
